Work is so much better with awesome coworkers

About us

Welcome to the workplace of the future! Cowork Btown offers affordable workspace and exciting social events for professionals of all sorts – right in the heart of downtown Bloomington. Although the space encourages collaboration, Cowork Btown is not just for entrepreneurs. The organization attempts to leverage the flexibility of the new working world, gathering likeminded small businesses, artists, musicians, and remote workers that love (and hope to keep their talents in) Bloomington.

Current coworkers range between 22 and 43 years old and include Bloomington natives, one-time residents of other Midwestern states, and migrants from both coasts. All coworkers take their work very seriously and are expected to respect the time and space of others, but their office hours vary drastically.

We are located in the beautiful town of Bloomington, IN. We just moved into our space not even a block off the square! Our space has a large open working area with several dedicated desk and drop in work stations. We have two meeting rooms. One is more traditional with a conference table and whiteboard. The other is more casual with comfortable seating and a TV. If you'd like to visit us feel free to drop by during normal work hours through the week or keep an eye out for one of our open events.

David Snodgress | Herald-Times

David Snodgress | Herald-Times

 

Membership Plans

Designated Desk

Includes permanent desk and chair, the freedom to do with them as you please, access to the conference room and 24/7 key access.

$255/month

Apply

Part Time

We can't guarantee a desk to yourself, but there's always somewhere to sit! Drop-ins are invited to work at the space up to 16 hours each week or two full days, may attend all after hours events, and are able to rent the conference room twice per month. Sorry, no key, but doors are open from 8:00 AM to 7:00 PM most days.

$65/month

Signup

Drop-In

Here, everyone's welcome. While events and space rental are reserved for our members, we encourage all community members to stop in and see what we're about. If you feel like hanging out, please consider leaving a small donation – a coffee's worth is more than enough.

Donation

Just come on in and we'll work out the donation.

Corporate Sponsorship

Interested in additional meeting space for your team? Access to a pipeline of local talent? Consider a corporate sponsorship. A donation of $595 gives your company monthly access to our conference room, a logo on the website, and access to the office bulletin board. Larger donations usually mean more access, but are handled on a case-by-case basis.

$595/yr

Signup

Where is Cowork Btown?

Cowork Btown is currently located at 117 E 6th Street, just across from Pheonix Comics. There are a limited number of dedicated desks still available and abundant “drop-in” workspaces.

Cowork Btown Office
117 E 6th St
Bloomington, IN 47408

 

Interested in becoming a member?

Cowork Btown is an open coworking space so don't be afraid to stop by for the day to see if it'd be a good fit for you. If you think you're interested in joining us go to the plans section and pick the plan that's right for you.

View Plans

Events

Wednesday Night Owls
August 7th, 7:00 PM – 2:00 AM

Stop by after work for a night of nerd! Cowork Btown will have unlimited beer, pizza, music, and camaraderie. Take the opportunity to share what you’ve been working on, learn more about Bloomington happenings, and/or tackle a side project.
